definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
meticulous/(of domestic animals or fowls) young
brand of Hong Kong instant noodles/also used as term for instant noodles in general

sentences.english: Toys are like canvas, they are the physical representation of the monsters i draw.
sentences.chinese: 公仔就像是畫布，可以具體呈現我畫的怪物們。

sentences.english: I give her a egg super man doll.
sentences.chinese: 我送了她一隻鹹蛋超人公仔給她。

sentences.english: Does my Iron Man collectible figurine watch me when I sleep?
sentences.chinese: 我收藏的鋼鐵俠公仔也會在我睡覺的時候看着我嗎？

sentences.english: Star character dolls and puppets of the difference lies in the soul and not the soul.
sentences.chinese: 性格巨星和扯線公仔的分別，就在於有靈魂和沒靈魂。

definition: toy figurine/action figure/stuffed animal/doll/(fig.) sb's plaything
toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)
custom-designed cake (e.g. cake shaped like a guitar, camera or cartoon character)
Garfield (comic strip cat created by Jim Davis)
